xfy.fakeview.library.translator.data

接口 IDataTranslator<F extends FView,R extends android.view.View>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ImageDataTranslator, TextDataTranslator, ViewDataTranslator

    public interface IDataTranslator<F extends FView,R extends android.view.View>
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/9. Translate data in View into data in FView. Implement this interface and register it by invoke DataTranslatorManager.registerTranslator(Class, IDataTranslator) to translate your custom View data.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean checkSrc(android.view.View src)
      Indicate whether data in the source View can be translated.
      boolean translateData(F fview, R src)
      Implement this method to do translate

    • 方法详细资料

      • translateData

        boolean translateData(F fview,
                      R src)
        Implement this method to do translate
        参数:
        fview - target FView
        src - source View
        返回:
        true: translated success, false othrewise

      • checkSrc

        boolean checkSrc(android.view.View src)
        Indicate whether data in the source View can be translated.
        参数:
        src - source View
        返回:
        true: can be translated, false otherwise
